reviews.review_msg: You can tell that she is relatively new to instruction. But, her classes run well and she's very approachable. Her lectures are interesting but she can focus on one thing and test out another - or test on something that was mentioned briefly in class. Overall a decent instructor. And yes, she is gorgeous!
She is horrible on explaining things especially grammar, and she can give you hard time. if you wanna keep interesting in French, stay way, please
